item.title: By: uruloki
item.dc:creator: uruloki
item.description: Meh, it's nothing personal against the survey. It's probably more my fault for following all those links and filling them out in the first place :D
item.content:encoded: Meh, it’s nothing personal against the survey. It’s probably more my fault for following all those links and filling them out in the first place ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description:
Aww...but I like the linky. And unlike all the other surveys, I won't tell you if you're Gandalf or Legolas or a Blackrock Orc. I'll just give you raw data from a poorly designed survey, and you can take that to the bank! :)
I understand, though, if you don't want to link to it or to respond. It's entirely voluntary. The only thing I can say in its defense is that I've already found some very interesting insights into what players are looking for in MMOs.
item.content:encoded:
Aww…but I like the linky. And unlike all the other surveys, I won’t tell you if you’re Gandalf or Legolas or a Blackrock Orc. I’ll just give you raw data from a poorly designed survey, and you can take that to the bank! ðŸ™‚

I understand, though, if you don’t want to link to it or to respond. It’s entirely voluntary. The only thing I can say in its defense is that I’ve already found some very interesting insights into what players are looking for in MMOs.

item.title: By: uruloki

item.description: No linky from me! I filled out the survey, but I am just tired of MMO_Survey_0568 showing up everywhere...
